title: end of days for riot
body:
hi , 11.00 pm and now 58mins to log into a game, and still waiting, i think the end of days coming for league of legends, i think soon it WILL be a legend.. i spent alot of $$ into this crap, now i see this coming to an end. ok tomorrow is friday but still this didnt happen one year ago, so all things must come to an end .
all the re-hashing half priced champions, re-hashing all the half priced skins, not going to cut it in this market, but riot know this, im just voicing my disappointment . riot should ask me/we about how to market this in OCE in what we need to boost players playing! ive been playing games for 30 odd years now, i think i might know i thing or 2 what players want.
lol i just checked the wait time and i never knew the clock resets after 1hr back to 00

i think riot should look at the log details, they will see how long its been.

replies.body:
Lol, this muppet :)

Obviously a problem on his end/ISP

I have not waited much more than 5mins in the last 4 years of League.
And I play right through the night until 6-7am at times.
probs cause he trolls every game and they gave him que extensions :p

The most I have waited was 20 mins, for a twisted treeline game

norms is around 8 mins but that was a problem with my router that I went and fixed
Sounds like you need to check your connection buddy.
No where near gone, no matter what they do.

wtf are you smoking??  the higher end, core group are not giving riot $$, its the b5/4 players like me who are stooges into giving riot $$. now wating more than a fk ing 1hr to play , how can this be enjoyable ??

The problem isn't rampant. I have never heard of that happening until I read your post. Could just be your internet connection and/or ISP. League is a very looong way away from dying. It's continually freshening up the game with new champion releases and indirectly released teasers and leaks. 
I just made a post regarding the next champion. It's in the Miscellaneous Tab.

so just to confirm, you enter in your username and password then it says logging in, and it takes over an hour?

is this correct?
